original: The consumer economy refers to an economic system driven by the consumption of goods and services by individuals. This concept highlights the significance of consumer behavior and its impact on economic activities. Notably, issues related to the storage and maintenance of goods have been identified as limitations within consumer economies. As demand may eventually stagnate and credit could be restricted, these factors pose challenges to
